comments:
Created an attachment (id=78924)
report design

Description:
Exception is thrown out when preview the attached report design.

Build number:
2.2.0.v20070921-1313

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the attached report design and preview.

Expected result:
No exception.

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out.

Error log:
ReportDesign (id = 1): 
- Filter expression cannot reference to java script object "row.__num". 
data.engine.filterExprContainRowNum ( 1 time(s) )
